content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help get a plumber scheduled for you. Can I get your name to start the process?
Thank you, Linda! What address will the plumber be visiting?
It's Ridgewood. By the park. House on the corner with the red mailbox.
Thank you, Linda. Could you please provide the full street address, including the house number and zip code? This helps ensure our plumber arrives at the right place.
Why do you need all that? It's easy to find. Tell the plumber to just come to the corner house with the red mailbox.
I understand, Linda. To make sure there’s no confusion or delay, a full address is required in our booking system. Could you share the street name, house number, and zip code?
Just tell him Ridgewood, corner by the park, red mailbox. If your plumber can't find that, maybe you should get someone who knows the area.

I apologize for any frustration. Our team must enter a complete address to finalize your booking. Without it, I won’t be able to schedule your appointment. Can you please provide the full street address and zip code?
reason: Customer refused to provide a valid address.
